#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	if (t > 40)
		return 0;
	while (t--) {
		string inp;
		cin>>inp;
		int res = 0;
		int len = inp.length();
		for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
			if (inp[i] == 'A' || inp[i] == 'D' || inp[i] == 'O' || inp[i] == 'P' || inp[i] == 'Q' || inp[i] == 'R')
				res++;
			else if (inp[i] == 'B')
				res += 2;
		}
		cout<<res<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
